item.title: Full stack react redis app
item.author: antonio@placerda.pt (Antonio P. Lacerda)
item.description: I wanted to get an app live and here it is! I followed a tutorial from code drip to help me start this. Since this was supposed to be a simple test of my skills, I didn’t want to pay for a hosting solution. I checked digital ocean, amazon web services and google cloud platform. I also tried firebase, but it also seemed an overkill. So, I went with heroku! Initially I had an express app running for the api where it would only fetch the data from the redis database, a worker with a scheduled cron job and the react server for the frontend.
